channel.title: Squarespace development
channel.description:
[quote] Hello,
We are looking for help with the coding of a squarespace project.
Here is a link to one of the images <https://www.dropbox.com/s/ndrykf8g4e4prih/1-Home_PC.jpg?dl=0>
Are you available for this project?
Best Regards
Pablo [/quote]

item.title: Squarespace development
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

I'm generally available, but I'm not sure what kind of help you're looking for.

Usually people ask me very specific questions of some feature they want and squarespace doesn't offer. Although if you want to use such images as a reference to a fresh site you want to build with squarespace, I sure can help with that as well.

In any case, please do read www.cregox.com/your-home if you haven't yet.

Read full topic
